author: Sarah Krouse
title: Risk for 911: Who Will Answer?
description: Risk for 911: Who Will Answer? (Third column, 3rd story, link ) Related stories: VIRUS HITS POLICE... 12% Of NYPD Out Sick... Unemployment, Shutdowns Recipe for Social Unrest...
content:
Public-safety call centers are confronting an unexpected 911 emergency: keeping the people who answer the phone healthy.
As the new coronavirus spreads in communities across the U.S., 911 call centers are grappling with how to ensure their dispatchers dont g… [+96 chars]
